channel.title: Weird Windows VM wireless adapter situation
channel.description:
Hey guys,
So I've got Windows 7 VM on virtual box running through the whonix gateway. It works fine except I've got 3 adapters showing.
I can disable the other 2 to force the whonix gateway connection BUT if I run a VPN it seems to need the Local Area Connection 2 turned on.
Any ideas?
Screenshots attached.
[url=https://ibb.co/nLOMfd][img]/uploads/default/original/2X/a/a41c22c02a3b5b1df9e37776ce4f5b735ede8ea6.png[/img][/url]
